hero.description: Hi, I'm Kenny, the owner of Smilehandyman.com. While I spend my week working professionally, I've dedicated my Sundays to a personal volunteer project: visiting seniors and neighbors in NYC who need a little help with their devices, Wi-Fi, or apps.
hero.noCatch: Personal help with no catch, no sales pitch, and no fees. Just me using my skills to help our community.
hero.pilotDescription: This project is a personal labor of love during my off-hours. I'm taking it one step at a time, with the hope of growing this into a formal nonprofit in the near future.

about.title: About Me & Why I Started This
about.description1: Support New York isn't a big organization—it's a personal volunteer project that I, Kenny, started to give back to the city I live in.
about.description2: Through my work at 'Smile Handyman,' I've met so many people who feel overwhelmed by modern technology. I realized that a little bit of my time on Sundays could make a huge difference in someone's daily life, so I decided to start visiting neighbors personally to offer free tech support.
about.description3: Right now, this is a personal initiative I run during my spare time. However, my ultimate goal is to evolve this project into a registered nonprofit organization. Every Sunday I spend with my neighbors helps me learn how I can better serve this community in the future.
about.focus1: Connecting to Wi-Fi and setting up smartphones or apps
about.focus2: Simple tech support and troubleshooting at home
about.focus3: Guiding seniors through email, video calls, and basic computer tasks
about.quote: This isn't a business. This is real, personal help for my neighbors.

services.title: What I Can Help You With
services.description: On Sundays when I'm available, I offer free help with everyday technology challenges. This is my personal way of contributing to our neighborhood.
services.note: All help is free and provided as a personal volunteer effort. I focus on low-risk, non-invasive help. For complex repairs or financial accounts, please consult a professional service.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi & Internet
wifi.description: Setting up Wi-Fi and fixing connection problems

smartphone.title: Smartphones & Tablets
smartphone.description: Basic setup, installing apps, and showing you how to use them

videocall.title: Video Calls
videocall.description: Setting up Zoom, FaceTime, or WhatsApp to stay in touch with family

email.title: Email & Online Basics
email.description: Creating accounts, sending photos, and navigating the web

hometech.title: Home Tech Help
hometech.description: Setting up remotes, changing batteries, or organizing cables

online.title: Online Tasks
online.description: Filling out forms, using YouTube, and printing documents

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Adjusting settings for low vision, hearing, or mobility needs

stories.title: Stories from My Sunday Visits
stories.description: These are the personal stories and photos from my Sunday visits. It's incredibly rewarding to see how a little tech help can brighten someone's day.
stories.checkBack: I'm currently putting together some stories to share with you. Please check back soon!
stories.quote: Every Sunday, I'm not just fixing a device—I'm building a bridge to connection for my neighbors.
stories.message: Community Sundays are about more than just technology. They're about making sure our neighbors don't feel left behind in the digital age.

notice.title: Notice
notice.description: This is where I'll share updates on my journey from a personal project to a nonprofit, along with news about community events.
notice.stayTuned: Stay tuned as I work toward making this a more formal and sustainable initiative.
notice.serviceAreaMessage: Since I'm doing this personally, I'm currently focused on Manhattan and Williamsburg (Brooklyn). Please email me in advance to confirm if I can make it to your area!

howToApply.title: How to Request My Help
howToApply.description: If you need a hand with technology, I'm happy to help if I can. Please send me an email with:
howToApply.step1: What you need help with (e.g., Wi-Fi issues, smartphone setup)
howToApply.step3: How I can reach you (phone or email)
howToApply.availability: I do this during my personal free time, so availability is limited. I'll do my best to get back to you and schedule a visit.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a question, want to volunteer with me, or know someone who needs help? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.volunteerDescription: I'm always looking for patient people who want to join me in helping our community. Reach out if you'd like to join my Sunday team!

footer.tagline: Personal tech help for my neighbors.
footer.disclaimer: This is a personal volunteer project by Kenny (owner of Smilehandyman.com) and is not yet a registered nonprofit.
